sources.name: UK Public Spending (ukpublicspending.co.uk)
sources.description:
UK Public Spending - Defence
Data provider ukpublicspending.co.uk
Source International Historical Statistics (Brian Mitchell), Measuring worth (measuringworth.com), Office for Budget Responsibility, and UK Treasury
Description Public spending on defence as a percentage of GDP
Linkhttp://www.ukpublicspending.co.uk/uk_defence_spending_30.html
Retrieved10/09/2015

Additional information

Historical data provided by International Historical Statistics (Brian Mitchell) and the Measuring Worth project (measuringworth.com). Recent data comes from official sources (Office for Budget Responsibility and HM Treasury).

variables.name: Defence spending as a percent of GDP
